20101222070313.000|20101222070314.000|CC1|EVACUATION ORDERS WENT OUT

20101222070413.000|20101222070414.000|CC1|CLOGGED A DEBRIS BASIN, CAUSING 
20101222070414.000|20101222070416.000|CC1|MUD TO FLOW THROUGH THE

20101222070514.000|20101222070517.000|CC1|CLAREMONT TO SHOW US HOW        
20101222070517.000|20101222070518.000|CC1|THEY'RE HOLDING UP.             
20101222070518.000|20101222070521.000|CC1|>> Reporter: ABOUT 2,000        
20101222070521.000|20101222070522.000|CC1|CUSTOMERS ARE WITHOUT POWER     
20101222070522.000|20101222070524.000|CC1|LONG BEACH TO WHITTIER.         
20101222070524.000|20101222070525.000|CC1|THIS IS A VERY FAMILIAR STORY.  
20101222070525.000|20101222070529.000|CC1|IT WAS A TREE THAT WAS          
20101222070529.000|20101222070530.000|CC1|WATERLOGGED, SATURATED, THE     
20101222070530.000|20101222070531.000|CC1|GROUND WAS SATURATED.           
20101222070531.000|20101222070533.000|CC1|THEN THAT TREE CAME DOWN ON THE 
20101222070533.000|20101222070536.000|CC1|POWERLINES AND KNOCKED OUT      
20101222070536.000|20101222070541.000|CC1|POWER TO HUNDREDS OF FAMILIES   
20101222070541.000|20101222070542.000|CC1|DAYS BEFORE CHRISTMAS.          
20101222070542.000|20101222070544.000|CC1|CANDLES WERE SCATTERED AROUND   
20101222070544.000|20101222070546.000|CC1|THE KITCHEN AND GAS LANTERNS    
20101222070546.000|20101222070548.000|CC1|WERE IN PLACE, NOT THE WAY THEY 
20101222070548.000|20101222070550.000|CC1|IMAGINED THEIR TUESDAY NIGHT,   
20101222070550.000|20101222070551.000|CC1|BUT THERE LITTLE CHOICE.        
20101222070551.000|20101222070555.000|CC1|>> I GRABBED OUR CAMPING STUFF  
20101222070555.000|20101222070556.000|CC1|AND BROUGHT IT UPSTAIRS.        
20101222070556.000|20101222070602.000|CC1|WE HAVE THE PROPANE STOVE AND   
20101222070602.000|20101222070603.000|CC1|PROPANE LANTERN.                
20101222070603.000|20101222070605.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THEY'RE ABOUT ONE  
20101222070605.000|20101222070607.000|CC1|OF 100 FAMILIES THAT ARE OUT OF 
20101222070607.000|20101222070608.000|CC1|POWER, FORCED FROM THE GRID     
20101222070608.000|20101222070610.000|CC1|AFTER A TREE SNAPPED POWERLINES 
20101222070610.000|20101222070612.000|CC1|ON BASELINE ROAD.               
20101222070612.000|20101222070614.000|CC1|>> IT'S FREEZING, BECAUSE THE   
20101222070614.000|20101222070615.000|CC1|HEATER DIDN'T WORK.             
20101222070615.000|20101222070620.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE FAMILY HAD TO

20101222070625.000|20101222070626.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IT WAS A SIMILAR   
20101222070626.000|20101222070629.000|CC1|STORY FOR RESIDENTS ALONG THE   
20101222070629.000|20101222070631.000|CC1|AREA, IN BETWEEN LAVERNE AND    
20101222070631.000|20101222070632.000|CC1|CLAREMONT.                      
20101222070632.000|20101222070634.000|CC1|>> LIGHT CANDLES, FIRE IN THE   
20101222070634.000|20101222070636.000|CC1|FIREPLACE, SO WE'RE WARM IN ONE 
20101222070636.000|20101222070636.000|CC1|ROOM.                           
20101222070636.000|20101222070638.000|CC1|WE HAVE THE STOVE THAT WORKS    
20101222070638.000|20101222070639.000|CC1|WITH THE GAS.

20101222070640.000|20101222070643.000|CC1|>> Reporter: OFFICIALS WITH     
20101222070643.000|20101222070645.000|CC1|SOCAL EDISON SAY THE TREE CAME  
20101222070645.000|20101222070648.000|CC1|CRASHING DOWN AT ABOUT          
20101222070648.000|20101222070649.000|CC1|MIDNIGHT, SNAPPING POWERLINES   
20101222070649.000|20101222070651.000|CC1|AND TOPPLING UTILITY POLES.     
20101222070651.000|20101222070653.000|CC1|>> WHEN ONE POLE CRASHED DOWN,  
20101222070653.000|20101222070656.000|CC1|THEY ALL CAME OUT LIKE          
20101222070656.000|20101222070657.000|CC1|TOOTHPICKS.                     
20101222070657.000|20101222070659.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE OUTAGE         
20101222070659.000|20101222070700.000|CC1|AFFECTED 400 HOMES.             
20101222070700.000|20101222070702.000|CC1|THE CREWS WORKED TO RESTORE     
20101222070702.000|20101222070704.000|CC1|POWER TO MOST, BUT MANY ARE IN  
20101222070704.000|20101222070705.000|CC1|THE DARK.                       
20101222070705.000|20101222070707.000|CC1|>> WE DECIDED TO BACK UP AND    
20101222070707.000|20101222070709.000|CC1|HEAD OVER TO THE IN?LAWS HOUSE  
20101222070709.000|20101222070713.000|CC1|A FEW CITIES OVER.              
20101222070713.000|20101222070714.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BASELINE ROAD      
20101222070714.000|20101222070714.000|CC1|REMAINS CLOSED.                 
20101222070714.000|20101222070716.000|CC1|AS YOU CAN SEE, CREWS ARE STILL 
20101222070716.000|20101222070718.000|CC1|WORKING ON THE SITUATION OUT    
20101222070718.000|20101222070718.000|CC1|HERE.

20101222070719.000|20101222070723.000|CC1|THAT WERE KNOCKED DOWN BY THE   
20101222070723.000|20101222070724.000|CC1|HUGE EUCALYPTUS TREE.           
20101222070724.000|20101222070727.000|CC1|IT WILL TAKE A WHILE.           
20101222070727.000|20101222070729.000|CC1|SOCAL EDISON WILL BRING IN      
20101222070729.000|20101222070733.000|CC1|GENERATORS AS A TEMPORARY FIX.  
20101222070733.000|20101222070735.000|CC1|REPORTING LIVE FROM CLAREMONT,  
20101222070735.000|20101222070740.000|CC1|ROBERT HOLGUIN, ABC 7 NEWS.

20101222070855.000|20101222070856.000|CC1|ELEVATION, TODAY'S RAIN TURNED

20101222070902.000|20101222070905.000|CC1|>> THIS IS WHITE GOLD FOR US.   
20101222070905.000|20101222070909.000|CC1|THIS IS WHAT THE TOWN LIVES OFF 
20101222070909.000|20101222070910.000|CC1|OF.                             
20101222070910.000|20101222070915.000|CC1|IT BRINGS BUSINESS FOR US.      
20101222070915.000|20101222070918.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IN LYTLE CREEK,    
20101222070918.000|20101222070920.000|CC1|SOME DRIVERS DECIDED TO VENTURE 
20101222070920.000|20101222070922.000|CC1|THROUGH THE FLOOD ZONE ANYWAY.  
20101222070922.000|20101222070926.000|CC1|>> I CAME THROUGH IT WHEN IT    
20101222070926.000|20101222070929.000|CC1|WAS RIGHT HERE.                 
20101222070929.000|20101222070931.000|CC1|>> RESCUE TEAMS WERE ABLE TO    
20101222070931.000|20101222070933.000|CC1|PULL THIS WOMAN TO SAFETY WITH  
20101222070933.000|20101222070934.000|CC1|ONLY MINOR INJURIES.            
20101222070934.000|20101222070936.000|CC1|>> WHEN SHE WENT OFF THE EDGE,
